answers.answer: Any other symptoms like light headedness, overheating? If so I got told its my blood pressure dropping

Passing out when pregnant can be caused by a lot of things. Blood pressure to low or high, low blood sugar or low iron, dehydration or simply becoming overheated. If it happens a fairly often you should talk with tour kicks to try and figure out the cause. Fainting and falling down the wrong way can cause serious injuries or the underlying problem could be something life threatening like preeclampsia if left untreated.
Thank yes sometimes I get overheated out of no where and my heart starts racing fast I might have to make me an appointment with my doctor to get myself checked out
This was happening to me, I freaked out about it, but was told by the doctor it is normal in pregnancy because of your heart working extra hard to also help the baby
That could b it I haven't had this problem with my son two years ago

question: I've been dizzy heart racing fast like I'm.gonna past out and idk y I bet one of these days I'm.gonna pass out idk if it's low iron but my doctor didn't tell me that I have low iron so Idk
title: ever since I became pregnant I've b dizzy
